everytime i play with my non prime friends we get full queue of cheaters on the enemy team.64 tick is still a thing.They ruined bhoping by making a 50/50 chance if you time it perfectly.This game has the most toxic community i have ever seen.Either you play with a 11 year old kid that micspams or with mister vladimir vladinsky who tries to kick you constantly,griefs,very often uses cheats,deranks or swears in russian,or all of the above.They ruined trading so they get more profit(keys made into a contraband) and thought free cs is a good idea for some reason.Every good thing about it is made by the community and not valve themselves.We didnt have an operation for over 2 years.In conclusion without the community CS:GO is 3/10 at best,and i cant even talk about cases and older controversies like shuting down competition for making their own casino.
Ne diyebilirim ki, herkes için klasik olmuş bir oyuna yorum yapmaya gerek yok
